m_displayName: WEAPON - SRAM - LAME OURAI - Survitalité Ourai

description.fr: Lorsque votre héros est soigné : Inflige {value:pc,percent} de sa {%PV} aux adversaires adjacents\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
description.en: When your hero is healed: Inflicts {value:pc,percent} of their {%PV} on adjacent\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> opponents.
description.es: Cuando tu héroe es curado: Inflige un {value:pc,percent} de su {%PV} a los adversarios adyacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
description.de: Wenn dein Held geheilt wird: Verursacht {value:pc,percent} seiner {%PV} bei den angrenzenden\_<sprite name="cell_cross"> Gegnern.
description.pt: Quando seu herói é curado: Inflige {value:pc,percent} de sua {%PV} aos adversários adjacentes\_<sprite name="cell_cross">.
